Text: After a few days working you notice someone consistently working late.

Speaker: You
Text: Wilson| I've seen you staying late quite a bit recently.  Is everything okay.

Speaker: Wilson
Text: I've just got a lot of work to do on the CivCorp project.

Speaker: You
Text: I assigned that project to Frank| why are you working on it?

Speaker: Wilson
Text: He said he needed some help.

Speaker: You
Text: Does  he ask for help often?

Speaker: You
Text: Do you ever tell Frank you can't help?

Speaker: Wilson
Text: No| I can usually manage and it seems to really help Frank out.
